name: Village Defender (itch)
description:
The the leader of a monster village in a RPG world.
Every day humans, calling themselves as "Adventurers", raid your village to loot, destroy and kill everything in front of them to complete some silly requests from someone paying them to do so.
Defend your village and fellows!

Instructions:
LMB - Move
E - Attack

Goal:
Survive and prevent the humans from destroying the village's houses as long as you can.
